newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Senate panel to consider CVRD bill Tuesday.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Senate panel to consider CVRD bill Tuesday.

text.p: The Brazilian Senate's Economic Affairs Committee is slated to meet Tuesday to discuss a bill that would block the privatization of Companhia Vale do Rio Doce (CVRD), an official of the panel said Monday.
The committee members, scheduled to meet at 1000 local time/1200 GMT Tuesday, are due to take up other matters in addition to the mining concern's proposed sale.
The bill, drafted by Sen. Jose Eduardo Dutra of the opposition Workers Party, would allow the Senate to remove CVRD from the government's privatization list.

Government allies earlier said they hoped to convince the Economic Affairs Committee that the Senate's Infrastructure Committee ought to deal with the CVRD issue. The infrastructure panel is seen as more supportive of the government's policies.
